brand_identity.name: Heavenly Nature Ministry
brand_identity.mission: To empower street/abandoned children and orphans to fully utilize their spiritual, physical, and mental gifts to become self-reliant and harmonious citizens.
brand_identity.vision: To raise self-reliant and God-fearing generations in South Sudan and beyond.

design_principles.visual_style: Organic & Earthy with Royal Accents. A blend of warm African earth tones grounded by deep spiritual blues and highlighted with royal gold.
design_principles.low_bandwidth_strategy: Prioritize CSS effects over images. Use SVG icons. Lazy load all non-critical assets. No autoplay videos.

headings.usage: Main headers (H1-H3). Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for a premium feel.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, navigation. High readability.

usage_rules.primary: Main actions, headers, strong brand presence.
usage_rules.accent: Call to actions (Donate), highlights, spiritual metaphors (light/crown).
usage_rules.earth_tones: Backgrounds, sections, to ground the design in the local context.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Marketing, Mode B for Dashboard)
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section padding. Gap-6 to Gap-8 for grids.
layout.mobile_first: Stack all grids to col-span-1 on mobile. Images max-h-[50vh] on mobile.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all
buttons.accent: bg-accent text-black hover:bg-accent/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-glow transition-all

cards.style: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12 px-4

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Thin stroke (1.5px) for elegance.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text. Use darker earth tones for text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Disable parallax on low power mode.
accessibility.low_bandwidth: Compress all images to WebP. Lazy load images below the fold. Use system fonts as fallback.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot class-variance-authority`
2. Configure Tailwind theme with the colors and fonts defined above.
3. Create a `Layout` component that handles the responsive container and navigation.
4. Implement the 'Home' page first, focusing on the Hero section with the 'hero_worship' image and the 'We are one' slogan.
5. Build the 'Donation' component using the 'accent' color for the main CTA.
6. Ensure all images have `loading='lazy'` except the LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) image.
7. Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 tags and 'Manrope' for body text.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
